  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.CellEditorListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, javax.swing.event.RowSorterListener, javax.swing.event.TableColumnModelListener, javax.swing.event.TableModelListener, javax.swing.Scrollable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TCPFlowsDataTable

    public class DataTable<T>
extends javax.swing.JTable
    Represents a data table for use with the ARO Data Analyzer by customizing a JTable object.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataTable

        public DataTable()
        Initializes a new instance of the DataTable class. This default constructor should be used when the table model is not immediately available.

      • getSelectedItems

        public java.util.List<T> getSelectedItems()
        Returns the list of items currently selected in the table. This convenience method is for tables that use a multiple selection model.
        Returns:
        A java.util.List object containing the list of selected items.

      • getSelectedItem

        public T getSelectedItem()
        Returns the first selected item in the table. This convenience method is for tables that use a single selection model.
        Returns:
        The item.

      • getItemAtRow

        public T getItemAtRow(int row)
        Returns the data item at the specified row index. The row index is the table view index which may not be the same index as in the data table model.
        Parameters:
        row - An int value that is the row index in the table view.
        Returns:
        The data item.

      • setColumnModel

        public void setColumnModel(javax.swing.table.TableColumnModel columnModel)
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        The DataTableModel object.

      • setModel

      • selectItem

        public boolean selectItem(T item)
        Marks the specified item in the table as selected, if it exists.If the item exists in the table and is already marked as selected, the the selection is cleared.
        Parameters:
        item - The item in the table to mark as selected.
        Returns:
        A boolean value that is true if the specified item was found and marked as selected.

      • getPopup

        public javax.swing.JPopupMenu getPopup()
        Returns a popup menu.
        Returns:
        A JPopupMenu object that is the popup menu.

        Sets the popup menu for the DataTable.
        Parameters:
        popup - A JPopupMenu object that is the new popup .
